text: Having an issue with the css styles I add in not showing up when I view the page in a browser. HubSpot support said they re-minified the main.css file and that fixed the issue. Does anyone know how to do this process?
Just checking there is no way to trigger a workflow when one object is associated to another object is there?
You can easily do this, just use created date known
<@U01QVR44MEY> im not sure im with you
For example this workflow will run anytime a line item is associated
So I have a custom object called events if i want to trigger any time a new contact is associated to it I can create a new event workflow that triggers when contact create date is known?
correct

I'm trying to password protect an entire subdomain. Seems like this will have to be custom.

My thought right now is to build a custom module that I can insert into templates that will ask for a pw, validate the pw, then drop a cookie into the browser.
And before any page on this subdomain loads, check for the cookie first, if it's there, show the page, if not, request the pw.
Anyone have experience with that?
why not just use password pages?
yeah you'd have to set it up on each page. But seems a lot easier to me
Plus it would be a lot more secure....
I guess the reasoning behind not using default pw protect is that users would have to enter in the pw on every page
Yeah that's very true, but you could always just use membership pages to get around this
I think they're only on CMS Pro so we don't have the membership options unfortunately.
Oh didn't realize that they were only available for pro+
memberships are actually enterprise only :face_with_peeking_eye:
Yeah, it's not in the cards for enterprise right now. Might just try to talk them into using the default pw protect
We are working with a client who is looking at MemberSpace as an alternative
might be worth checking out
Thanks Jennifer! I'll look into that. Might be a solution
they have a developer account that will let you build it and transfer it to their account so they don't start paying until it is ready to deploy
it's at least phase 4 of the project for us and we haven't gotten past the cms hub signup yet, but preliminary research looks promising

Hello, I have a question, does anyone know if they changed for the Endpoints in HubSpot Files API?

before I had a configured query, and it worked fine, today I tried it, and it no longer worked, I went back to check the endpoints, and now it works fine to have `accept: application/json` and `content-type application/json` whereas before it only required `content-type application/json`

 If this change, someone would be so kind to tell me the end points that changed, so I can change locally, thank you very much.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1668027639689199>

Hello, I have a question -- Our team is trying to utilize the Blog CMS <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/blog-post> -- I need help finding a way to trigger a webhook on content changes which would be vital to the build process. We are using `Vercel` as our deployment vendor. Anyone has worked on this before?
I am trying to page optimization but facing issue with these two script can any help me
